original_text: and placed it in his own new tomb that he had cut out of the rock. He rolled a big stone in front of the entrance to the tomb and went away.
korean_text: 바위 속에 판 자기 새 무덤에 넣어 두고 큰 돌을 굴려 무덤 문에 놓고 가니

sentences.original_text: and placed it in his own new tomb
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것을 그의 새 무덤에 두었다

sentences.original_text: that he had cut out of the rock
in front of the entrance to the tomb
